about_me.paragraph1: I'm a passionate frontend developer with solid experience in
about_me.paragraph_continue: . My main goal is to create exceptional user experiences that exceed expectations. I love tackling new challenges and am constantly seeking ways to improve and learn.
about_me.paragraph2: My commitment to excellence is reflected in every project I work on, always striving to offer innovative and efficient solutions. I'm dedicated to making a positive impact on users' lives through my work, and I'm excited about the opportunities the future may bring.

projects.section_subtitle: Here are all my projects completed so far.

project_llama.title: Project Llama
project_llama.description: This project aims to manage employees, events, and tasks. It has a backend that stores the data and performs CRUD operations.
project_llama.libraries: Stack MERN, CSS, HTML, Javascript, DND-KIT, RESEND, Big Calendar, MUI, React-Router 6

project_plaza_vea.title: Project Plaza Vea
project_plaza_vea.description: This is a landing page project I created with a partner where we implemented React, MUI, and CSS. Its functionality is to mimic the official Plaza Vea page in Peru.

online_store_project.title: Online Store Project
online_store_project.description: This is a landing page for a shoe store that was made with CSS3, HTML5, and Bootstrap. The objective is to learn how to implement HTML5 and CSS3 structure, as well as the Bootstrap library.

contact.write_details: Write your details here and they will be sent to my email so I can get in touch with you. If you want to contact me, leave a comment, or report a bug.

status_messages.error: There was an error submitting the form.
